coreAttributes.name: Amazonian Ambrosia
coreAttributes.description: A miniature terracotta amphora, filled with a heady red wine. The description on the label is terse, but promises to 'make an Amazon' out of anyone who drinks it.
coreAttributes.applyEffects:
As the rich wed wine begins to circulate through [npc.her] system, [npc.name] [npc.verb(feel)] [npc.her] body subtly changing...

[#npc.incrementFemininity(5)] [#npc.incrementMuscle(3)] [#npc.incrementAlcoholLevel(0.1)]

useDescriptions.selfUse: Opening the amphora of Amazonian Ambrosia, [npc.name] [npc.verb(tilt)] [npc.her] head back and [npc.verb(bring)] it up to [npc.her] waiting [npc.lips]. The rich, red wine contained within has a strong, heady fragrance, which seduces [npc.name] into quickly taking a deep draught. Discovering that the wine's taste is every bit as excellent as its smell, [npc.she] quickly drinks every last drop.
